scripts.dev-up: npm run dev-build && node -r dotenv/config -r @babel/register -r regenerator-runtime/runtime src/boot.js
scripts.seed: npm run dev-build && node -r dotenv/config -r @babel/register -r regenerator-runtime/runtime -r ./src/config/config.js ./scripts/quick_seed.js
scripts.sign: npm run dev-build && node -r dotenv/config -r @babel/register -r regenerator-runtime/runtime -r ./src/config/config.js ./scripts/sign.js
scripts.start: npm run build && rm -rf ./assets && cp -rf ./dist/* ./ && node -r regenerator-runtime/runtime src/start.js
scripts.new-access-point: npm run dev-build && node -r dotenv/config -r @babel/register -r regenerator-runtime/runtime -r ./src/config/config.js ./scripts/new_access_point.js
scripts.del-access-point: npm run dev-build && node -r dotenv/config -r @babel/register -r regenerator-runtime/runtime -r ./src/config/config.js ./scripts/del_access_point.js
scripts.script: npm run dev-build && node -r dotenv/config -r @babel/register -r regenerator-runtime/runtime -r ./src/config/config.js ./scripts/$SCRIPT.js
scripts.prod-new-access-point: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=./.env.prod npm run dev-build && node -r dotenv/config -r @babel/register -r regenerator-runtime/runtime -r ./src/config/config.js ./scripts/new_access_point.js
scripts.prod-del-access-point: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=./.env.prod npm run dev-build && node -r dotenv/config -r @babel/register -r regenerator-runtime/runtime -r ./src/config/config.js ./scripts/del_access_point.js
